lines.text: Worry is like interest paid in advance on a debt that never comes due.

You now have a Swiss bank account if anybody asks. Crédit Nationale Du Génève code name 'PADDY'. Lavish awkward gesture. All of fifteen Swiss Francs in it, but if you ever want to impress anybody, they can find out you have a Swiss account. But, Swiss law prohibits the bank from revealing the balance. Thus are all men made equal.

I think you'll find that if what you've done for them is as valuable as you say it is, if they are indebted to you morally but not legally, my experience is they will give you nothing, and they will begin to act cruelly toward you.
Why?
To suppress their guilt.
Nobody looks at a Japanese tourist.
We must never forget that we are human, and as humans we dream, and when we dream we dream of money.
I put a thief in my mouth to steal my brain.
Funny old world.
Funny old world? Dog my cats!
Dog my cats indeed.
I'm a problem solver, with a heart of gold.
Nobody going on a business trip would have been missed if he never arrived.
Always do business as if the person you're doing business with is trying to screw you, because he probably is. And if he's not, you can be pleasantly surprised.
How are things in the outer office?
My troika was pursued by wolves.
It's a good thing this cookie arrived unscathed.
Good people, bad people, they generally look like what they are.
Do the American thing.
What's that?
Marry a rich widow.
We used to say, a nymphomaniac who owns a liquor store.
Stun gun? What if you missed?
Well then, it would be back to the range for me...
[last lines]

[being arrested]
Can you help me? You're the Boy Scout. Can I be your good deed for today? Can't you help me, Joe?
I'm afraid you're gonna have to spend some time in your room.
It shows to go you, you never know who anybody is.
Beware of all enterprises which require new clothes.
If we all do our jobs, we will each be rewarded according to our just desserts.
Who in this world is what they seem to be? Who?
You never know who anybody is, except me. I am who I am.

It's an interesting setup, Mr. Ross. It is the oldest confidence game on the books. The Spanish Prisoner. Fellow says him and his sister, wealthy refugees, left a fortune in the home country. He got out, girl and the money stuck in Spain. Here is her most beautiful portrait. And he needs money to get her and the fortune out. Man who supplies the money gets the fortune and the girl. Oldest con in the world.
Next time, be born Italian.
You could call me Joe.
Yeah, long as I didn't take that as inducement to, you know, further intimacy.
When you own the company, can I be Queen?
[first lines]
What is the purpose of your trip, please?
Business.
Thank you and welcome to St. Estéphe.
